title: Completed PE Summary - Stena PioneerQ
raw_html:
Category Merchant
Registered Owner & Manager: Stena Line Ltd
Port of registry: Hamilton
Flag: Bermuda
Type: Ro-ro vehicle/passenger ferry
Built: 1975
Classification society: Norske Veritas
Construction: Steel
Length overall: 141.8
Gross tonnage: 14426.00
Date & Time 27/08/04 07:43
Location of incident: Larne harbour area
Incident Type: Fire/Explosion
Injuries/ fatalities: None
Damage/ Pollution: Minor Damage/No Pollution

Synopsis

Switchboard fire caused by mechanical breakdown within a generator breaker.

Action taken:

The Chief Inspector of Marine Accidents wrote to:

  • Stena Line supporting the actions taken as a result of their internal inquiry

  • Broadgate, the manufacturer of the VDR, recommending that they make all users aware of procedures to ensure that the VDR is switched on and to ensure that the MAIB is kept informed of changes to their VDRs that could affect data retrieval.

Synopsis

Switchboard fire caused by mechanical breakdown within a generator breaker. 

Action taken:

The Chief Inspector of Marine Accidents wrote to: 

  * Stena Line supporting the actions taken as a result of their internal inquiry 

  * Broadgate, the manufacturer of the VDR, recommending that they make all users aware of procedures to ensure that the VDR is switched on and to ensure that the MAIB is kept informed of changes to their VDRs that could affect data retrieval.
